column5: Thats pretty nice stuff bud!!

Keeping busy in the rod shop for some of our members so I thought I'd share a few pictures.  First a Sage fly rod for Ctranter....      The completed handle for Floatman55      A quick look at the reel seat for the rod I'll be guiding tomorrow, heading to Troutguy upon completion.    And another handle shot for Misfish's new steelie rod.
Truly fine work Chris! You are a skilled artist, there is no doubt.Love the detail in the the first pic.  Awesome Chris!
Thanks Paul. But I can't take credit for the custom handle on that one, I merely fit and installed it. I believe the guy Ctranter commisioned for the handle is out in Alaska.
Looks great Spieler
Beautiful work,
Stop teasing me,get back to work.LOL  Nice to see you got a handle on my new BUTT.  Nice work bud.Cant wait.
hahahahha   Yes, truly high calibre craftsmanship Chris-good on yah dude   I think i got my name attached to something comming off that work bench in the very near future   Paul

The pic doesn't do the handle justice Chris it's a beauty!! Really happy with the work so far.  Anyone looking to have something made up should shoot Chris a msg or email. great guy to work with, amazing workmenship and a high standard of quality.  won't be the last rod he builds for me
Agreed Ryan. The choice of wood and metal hardware were a particularly good choice on your part!  It all looks oddly familiar.
Quack quack,bang.
ooohhh so that's whos that was  thanks for making my decision easier Mike lol
All I can say is WOW...beautiful work.  pride in craftsmanship...the lost art in this day of disposable goods.  Very nice Spiel  Cheers  Craig
cool
Thank for sharing your pictures
Dang thats some nice stuff there awesome work Chris
Very nice Chris  I may be calling sometime this summer for a reel seat with some custom specs...
Excellence at it's best  Awesome work Chris
ANYONE would be proud to carry one of your sticks Spiel...A+ craftsmanship
The list of very happy customers continues to grow.  Impressive work as always Chris !!
Looks like somebody has been very busy these days
Thanks folks for the kind words.
I love tying rods up and have made what I thought were some dang nice ones but yours are miles ahead of mine - true art!!!! WOW!
Really nice work there!!
Spiel....one of these days I will place an order for a Spiel Custom rod!  I'm always amazed at your work!

Thanks Landry. I'm sure your rods are just fine and I can assure you that my first rods 37 years ago weren't all that pretty but they were functional and I was proud of them. Truth is after all these years I'm still improving and refining my work with every rod.   Thank you Josh.    You know where to find me Cliff.
